metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22939 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: If the Node.js https API was used incorrectly and "undefined" was in passed for the "rejectUnauthorized" parameter, no error was returned and connections to servers with an expired certificate would have been accepted.

criterions.comment: nodejs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
